ingredients.ingredient: 1 large taro root, peeled and sliced into 1/4-inch disks

cookingTips: Slice taro uniformly for even baking and consistent crispness
Pat slices dry to remove starch and promote crisping
Toss lightly with oil to avoid soggy chips
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on handling taro properly to achieve crispy exterior while preventing interior drying, and suggest timing for checking doneness.
